name: Distorted Illusions
description:
Distorted Illusions is a free and relaxing block puzzle game.

Distorted Illusions Free features:
- 2 game modes (Block Slide and Block Swap)
- 3x3 puzzle difficulty for both game modes
- Leaderboards based on least number of moves
- 6 different puzzles
- 8 relaxing music tracks

Distorted Illusions Premium features:
- 40+ different puzzles
- Puzzle difficulties 3x3 to 12x12 for both game modes
- Import your own custom puzzles
